name: UnspecifiedDisorderOfKidneyAndUreter
title: Unspecified Disorder of Kidney and Ureter
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen Computed Tomography (CT)—Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-10, diagnoses of unspecified disorder of kidney and ureter must appear on the abdomen CT claim to be excluded from the measure’s initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with other disorders of the kidney and ureter.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have disorders of the kidney and ureter.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with disorders of the kidney and ureter that are unspecified, or diseases that are classified elsewhere are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Diseases that are not related to the kidney or ureter, or those captured in systems other than ICD-10, are excluded from the value set.)
